participant_1.background:
I'm worried that my fantasies will get in the way of my new relationship.
my favorite drink is chocolate milk.
My commute is the best part of my day, as I get to listen to my favorite music and think about my robotics projects.
i drive a 2011 volkswagen passa.
I'm going to try to talk to my spouse about spending more time together this weekend, even though I know it's a long shot.

participant_2.background:
I remember reading my favorite comic books at home before going to bed.
i hope to visit quebec , canada someday.
i don t like feeling obligated to hang out with someone.
I have a hard time with my family, but I'm doing my best to work things out.
I'm so grateful to have a family that supports my creative career.

content.text: Hey! What are you up to today?
I'm working on my comic book!
It's about a robot who falls in love with a human girl.
Yeah, I'm really excited about it.
What's your favorite part of the process?
I think my favorite part is drawing the characters.
That's awesome! I love drawing too.
I know! It's so much fun to bring your imagination to life.
I'm glad to hear you're enjoying it.
Thanks! I'm really grateful to have a family that supports my creative career.
That's awesome! I'm sure they're really proud of you.
Well, I'm sure you're going to do great things.
